column4: is there a way to edit the colors after you login through gdm but before the desktop shows?
the little screen that loads your programs? or the brown before the picture?
the screen that loads right after you login but before the desktop shows. I've edited my gdm theme and my desktop theme and want to get rid of the brown.
right click on the desktop, change backkground, then choose solid color, or something like that, and change that color, I think.
